alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:38PM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Oberlin. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CST Tuesday was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 8.3 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Oberlin 13.0 13.1 Tue 8 pm CST 12.3 11.4 10.4 &&
